Very good - only down fall for my is that my LED pot light flicker a little bit even when its full bright - it doesn't bother me but doesn't happened with my Lutron switches.

Great product, good price.  Also wish there was a three way version of it in the same price range.  Last a dimmer smart switch will be great.  Those are the use cases I have to cover.Lots of packaging, with wire plugs and face plate, foam, big box.  I see them as having a slightly cheaper version with no frills (Just the switch for a retrofit use case as being ideal also)

J'ai acheté l'interrupteur intelligent afin de contrôler le minutage des lumières extérieurs. Il s'acquitte bien de la tâche qui lui est assignée c'est-à-dire: ouvrir et fermer les lumières. Instruction d'installation et de fonctionnement très précises. Facile à installer et à programmer.Je recommande ce produit.

First off, potential buyers take note that you must have a neutral wire in order to install this switch. The set up was a little tricky for me but that was related to connecting to the TP-Link wifi. The switch doesn't make a sound when it turns on and off, unlike an older programmable switch that this smart switch replaced.

I didn't.  I cannot use these in my apartment building built in the 1980s.  I threw away the box and now I cannot return to Amazon.  Wish I'd check the actual wiring before ordering.  I assume they worth 5 stars.
Facile à installer. Procédure d'installation  très simple dans l'application.  Facile à configurer. Fonctionne a merveille avec alexa. Je vais en acheter d'autres c'est certain !

Switch easy to install and connect to WIFI and Alexa easily. This product works great from the App or from Alexa or manually. If power outage, the switch will not turn on itself automatically like the WIFI bulb, which is a great positive point.
Coloque uno en cada cuarto sin detalles aparte de poner cable neutro, se conectan fácil a la red, y con Alexa o con la app de casa en súper sencillo utilizarlos.

Exactly as listed, very easy to instal if you are a little familiar with installing regular switch. It works perfect from remote locations, I could control my light from remote location using KASA App even I could set up a program to turn on-off for every day of week.I installed it about 2 weeks ago and so far no problem.
I have zero issues with these switches. Far more reliable than WeMo units and still work locally if you disable their internet access. I use mine with HomeAssistant.

Son muy buenoa compre 2 y funcionan correctamente .  Si no sabes de electricidad no intentes conectarlos te pide un neutro y la mayoria lo conecta mal y por eso no les funciona. Mi electrico me explico como conecTarlo y fue muy sencillo. La marca es grantia. El costo esta un poco alto pero  espero BAJEN DE PRECIO PARA MODERIZAR MI CASA.

Got it when it is on sale at $20. Good value at that price. Installation is a bit tricky when connecting the right wires. The setup is easy on the programming side. Easy integration with google homes.

Like that it connects directly to WiFi. No z-wave or zigbee hub required. I cannot place these hubs close to all the switches I will be changing slowly.However, your Wi-Fi router will need to able support a high number of devices. I use Google's mesh routers for better connectivity.

Was easy to set up in my phone once installed, and works with my Google Home. The actual installation of the switch in my wall was a hit tricky, but that's more so because the wiring in the box was a bit squirrelly. Works great, especially when we forget to leave the light on when we go out. Highly recommend!

Works great! loves how this does not require to talk to the server meaning, you just need to have an active wifi and it'll work. You don't need any internet access to your wifi network. I disable the internet access to this guy just to ensure that it will be even more secure. only way to access it is via my Raspberry pi + ssh. Great product!
Excellent product. Very stable signal connection.Most important updates software itself. Very safe to use.

Working as expected on WiFiInstallation for anyone without previous electrical experience should consider getting help.  Install information on the manufacturers site is excellent however worth heading my advice may avoid disaster

A pesar de que el producto es muy bueno, es un poco complicado de instalar, ya que requieres de ciertas herramientas en específico para poder hacerlo; en caso de no saber o no entenderle al diagrama un electricista podrá hacerlo sin mayor problema.

I bought one of these instead of a Christmas light timer. It was super easy to install (just be sure you have a fairly deep box) and the schedule function works perfectly for turning on and off my Christmas lights automatically. I can also use the app on my phone to switch it on and off.

2000sq ft. Home. Velop mesh network with 3 nodes. I purchased about 6 of these. They are always losing connection. They worked for the first few weeks when I had only a few, then I purchased more and the are constantly losing network connections. I also have 2 wemo dimmer switches and 2 wemo plugs and the wemo stay connected. I wish I hadn't purchased the t-link. Not happy at all. Resetting them doesn't get them to reconnect.

I love this product. Installed in both my bathrooms for controlling the fan. Set up schedule to turn the fan on twice a day in order to prevent humidity in basement bathroom and avoid mold. Very happy with this product

Works good, setup was very easy, however the plates to mount to Electrical box is rather thick causing the cover plate to stick out, I was adding to a 2gang existing box. I was able to trim the back of the plate to make it work.

I purchased 2 of these to automate lights at the front and back of the house. Setup was simple and done in minutes. The app is flawless and never given me a problem since setup a few months ago. Highly recommend.

Works great. Only real issue was I had to cut back the wiring that came with it as it took up too much space in electrical box. It would be nice if they could make their plastic wiring box a bit smaller. Also had to use standard face plate as the one that came with the switch wouldn't snap back on. Other than that, installation was simple and hookup to Alexa was easy. Shipping was super fast.
Decent brand name product.Simple reliable app.

Great little switch. Works exactly as expected and the software is easy enough to use. Only hang up I had was the thickness of the plug itself. It's much thicker than a standard switch which means the plate cover doesn't sit flat if you use it in a multi gang box. I had to shave down the drywall behind it to get the plate in my 4 gang box to sit flush. If you are installing in single gang box using the supplied plate cover then this probably isn't an issue.

I have been using this smart switch for over a month now, so far I am very happy as it was very easy to install and looks nice on the wall. I like the recess light that make the switch visible at night.

This product can only be used by one account at a time. So if you are in a house with other adults you can’t separate them without multiple accounts. So for example, if you want to separate use by what people in the house need, you can only attatch a switch to one account. So if I needed the front door and *room and someone els had front door and +room, only one person can have the front door on their account.
I installed this to turn my outside lights on and off. You can set it to work with sunrise and sunset which is great! Like Ron Popeil used to say, just set it and forget it. Ha ha.

Very easy to install if you have put a switch in before... set up was so simple.  I have installed 2x smart plugs and this switch at the cottage so I can preheat and turn the lights on.  The Kasa app is flawless, works every time.
I used these for my back and front outdoor lights.  I have them sent to automatically come on at sunset and turn off and sunrise.  Very easy to set up and lots of customizable settings.

Using TP-Link switch in concert with WeMo switches (& Alexa)...TP-Link is essentially identical to WeMo at a lower price point. The only issue is clunky app vs. WeMo, it does work but a bit fiddly in relation to seeking wifi and interface...fix the app and you have a complete winner!

This devise work for only a few hours and then stopped. The switch will not work unless you use your phone app. The switch would not work as a stand alone devise. I couldn’t get it to pair with Alexa.

when it works it works well, but once the wifi is restarted or if wifi on phone was switch off and back on, this device doesnt work well so when your in bed and to lazy to move, it says device either not connected or not found and you have to get up and reset it which sort of defeats its purpose wish it was blutooth instead

Todo muy bien, el aparato funciona perfecto, solo el diseño me parece algo como económico pero igual y ya por el precio se compensa pero podria haber opcion de instalarle tapas de otros estilos como por ejemplo en mi casa tengo tapas de acero inoxidable y la del tp link desentona un poco pero la verdad es que me gusta bastante como se conecto con el asistente de google.
Bueno, fácil de instalar y de configurar con la app se integra a la perfección con Google Home.Lo mejor es el precio en que lo encontré, muy buena compra.
Todavía no lo instalo, pero se ve de buena calidad y fabricación , te go otros productos de la misma línea y trabajan muy bien , así que no creo que este sea la excepción .

Have had this light switch about a year now and have no complaints with its function.  Works with both Google Home and with the app.  Have it in a double box and it barely fits, cannot do both switches in the box due to pre installed wires and number of marrets needed (teckin for double ganger works in that situation if you want both switches in one box to be smart).
Bought this for the kitchen it won’t work properly with the 2 light fixtures and 4 bulbs. The lights come on but dimmed until I take out 3/4 of the led bulbs
Got 3 on discount for $30/per. Great switch once you get it setup properly.However, the setup procedure is a bit pain even for a software engineer...

Great product. No issues at all, easy to install, slightly bigger then i thought to put in the electrical box, but once you move some wires around, you shouldn't have a problem.  Easy to use and setup, will buy again
Love it. Had an electrician install it for us. Much cheaper solution to putting a timer on our outside lights than buying lots of smart bulbs.

I have had three that have stopped working out of five shortly after a year.  Replaced two and another one just died.  Easy to set up and install but long term quality lacking and frustrating.  Looking for a higher quality product.

Works well with Alexa but is a TOTAL pain to set up on the WiFi.  Got very frustrated as the instructions are in the app you have to download to your phone.  Once I finally got it connected to WiFi, it was a breeze to link to Alexa and works well.
We love our smart switches! Being able to command them from the google home while breastfeeding is amazing! No more waking baby to turn out the lights :)
The switch was easy to install.  It paired simy with the wife and app.  The switch works well and the app has worked with no problems so far.
bought this switch 9 months ago was working great and now it just won't connect to the Wi-Fi anymore, I've took it off, restart it, reset it .. impossible to connect it back to Wi-Fi..

Unfortunately these units require three wires (hot, neutral and ground) to work which my present apartment does not have.I have other TP-Link devices so am sure that these will work just fine when I move into my next place.

This is the best smart switch I have bought! It is simple to install and works great. This helped me automate my main living area lights. This switch works great with alexa. I highly recommend purchasing it!
Purchased these switches for the exterior lights, they are not set up to come on at sunset and off at sunrise. The switch and the app perform flawlessly, would love to try the individual plug units.
Este apagador 'conectado' funciona muy bien, tal cual se describe en la publicación.Muy fácil de conectar a la red WiFi, además de que es compatible con Google Assistant (comprobado).

One of the switches I ordered has stopped working in a potentially dangerous way, all of a sudden it will NOT turn OFF.Reset the device and re-added the device, reset device and killed the power to the wall and turned back on immediately , pushing switch and resetting ever way imaginable and this switch will NOT turn OFF.
Easy to install. Easy to set up. Easy to utilizeDelivered within the "Prime" period

si funciona, prende y apaga desde la app, se puede programar el tiempo en que se prende y la funcion ausente es muy buena, solo que se desconecta del wifi y hay que hacer un reset para que se reconecte solo.

Assurer vous d’avoir une boîte électrique de bonne dimension car la partit intérieur est très grosse. Facile à installer et à programmer avec Alexa. Fonctionne à merveille et la lumière sur l’interrupteur est juste assez forte pour trouver la switch la nuit mais pas trop fort pour causer un inconvénient. Juste parfait.

Works like a charm.  I use the timer, and schedule functions.  It has been flawless for several months now.  Straightforward, easy, solid app.  Install was simple.  As some other reviews mention, it was a snug fit in my older box but everything fit in there.

It's great! I think once it got disconnected for because of a power outage during a storm. I kind of panicked for a moment since it looks like a normal switch and I thought there was nothing I could do. But then I remember it has two super subtle buttons at the bottom to reset it.  Seriously would recommend it. this was a test to see if their product was reliable . Definitely buying more, probably dimmers this time! again, LOVE IT

I had installed these switches in 3 rooms in our home. Whenever we go away, I can turn the lights on in the home one by one remotely through my smart phone, or have them come on, on their own, in pre-set intervals, giving the illusion that someone's home. Priceless. Love the technology. Easy to connect to power and Wi-Fi router.

Very easy installation. Worked like a charm.  The quality of the product is excellent.  Strongly recommend a buy.  Just one suggestion perhaps there could be a deal on a multi item purchase to encourage more purchases.
I was able to install and setup quite easily. Works perfectly. I now have 4 of these in our home. Easily controlled by the APP.

It worked great for just over a year, and I installed many TP-Link products into my smart house.  Now out of the blue they are dropping the wifi constantly, after nothing had changed in my system.  Incredibly frustrating, I guess I'm not used to something like a light switch failing.
This product is relatively big for a standard electrical box but it does fit.  Once installed the app allows for a relatively seamless install on  the 2.4 frequency.

Easy to install and works great!  In the words of my daughter "The monsters under the bed have been defeated". - I pointed out that the two monsters in her closet were also defeated.  Turns out she didn't know about the closet monsters.... :(  But the facts is, now she can safely get into bed and THEN turn off the lights so all is good!

Great way to control lighting without changing to smart bulbs.  Setup is easy by following the directions on the app.  I use it to control my entrance/ outdoor lights so that they are always on when I need them.  This is definitely a cheaper option to control lighting rather than going to smart bulbs.
No se pudo instalar ya que pide mas conecciones si tu casa no es nueva sera muy dificil que quede.
I tried to install the switch but it is too big.  I connected all its wires and give it a try.  It did connect to my wifi and Alexa is working, but it cannot fit in my wall hole.
Ça marche très bien, je ne suis pas électricien et j’ai été capable de les installer !Seul Hic, le changement d’heure qui n’est pas automatique ...
Easy to install, easy to set up, and generally all around extremely handy. Have had one in service for almost 2 years, just added 2 more to the mix.

Installed this unit for rear outdoor lights to use a security item.  Connected using Google Assistant.  Works great and allows us to call up the lights if we notice or hear something outside without going to the doors.
Installed 20 of this productworked ok until Nov 2019
Took less than an hour to install these 2 switches, an echo and do all the app setup. Working very well. Not sure why I didn’t do this earlier

doesn't work with philips hue so really annoying, Ex: ok google turn off light... desk light turn off but main ceilling light(connected to tp link HS200) doesn't so gotta use the switch to turn it off
I would change all my switches to the Kasa Smart Light Switch if I could - unfortunately I don't' have neutral wires in most locations.

Affordable, very easy to install (if I can do it, anyone can!) and works as promised. The Kasa app that controls it and other devices (I have one wifi outlet as well) is easy to use, with all the info you need to install, operate and resolve any issues. Operated my lights from the Caribbean using this system - worked great.

El producto funciona a la perfección, la app en IOS funciona muy bien, compatible también con Amazon Alexa en México, el cable neutro que requiere se baja de la lampara al apagador y es muy fácil de instalar. Muy buen producto.
Very easy to install! There’s instruction in the box as well and it was user friendly to connect to my google home!

Easy to connect, easy to use, works with Google home. The reason for 4 stars is the switch looks to be in the on position always and the sound it makes when you press it sounds cheap. Night light is a cool feature and Kasa app is pretty good.
Si eres deMexico es importante tomar en cuenta que la conexión de pared es cuádruple y la del
Doesn’t make led lights very bright.I only have 4 - 7w leds and they re 1/2 as bright compared to a normal switch.
Tp-link light switches seem to have great quality compared to others on Amazon. I'd know as I've bought multiple brands. Worth the extra couple of bucks. Nice clean app also.

Dead simple to install and setup, and they look great. These integrated well with my Google Home for voice control of my lighting. The app is simple and powerful.Changing your SSID forces you to reconnect the switches to your wifi.
Unlike other dimmable switch, wire connection is different and it takes a little bit time to figure it out.  And it takes more rooms to accommodate in device box.  It works as described

Amazing product, bought to schedule outdoor lights to come on/off at sunset/sunrise. Works perfectly.Easy enough to install after watching an online video. Now thinking of other locations in the house that I would benefit from these.

Swapped out my Belkin Wemo light switch for this one because the Belkin kept crashing my WiFi network - something to do with the DHCP I'm going to guess. The TP-Link has worked without a hitch and is definitely more stable than the Wemo. Sure, it doesn't have IFTTT, but the ease of use and zero issues and well worth it.

Fast shipment and great packaging. The installation is straight forward but the APP instruction was not quite clear. Suggest watching YouTube to learn if no experience before.Overall, Great products and save so many troubles on light control.
The first switch was fine but when I opened the second box, the switch was fully charred and repackaged and sealed in what appeared to be a brand new box.
I have 3 of these that I use with my Google Home minis and Google Nest Hub. Range is excellent and works very well with Google Home app.

It works Great! I am an Electrician, 4 wire you can See,green one for ground, white for neutral, 2 black for live and load, may need nice work, as the box a little bit right, after installing, download app from Google store,TD link saka, Input Wi-Fi password, give a  name to the switch , done. Open my Google home, add new device, choose smart switch hs200, I can use my Google mini to say turn it on now.

easy to install. Youtube vids helps alot. The only thing with these is they get offline frequently, so if ur home away, you can't use them via their apps. Someone needs to reset the buttons then goes online again.
Might have a difficult time installing if your wires arent coded properly and your socket isnt deep enough. Otherwise, great product.

La instalación tuvo q ser analizada mucho por como tenía mi instalación y como normalmente se instala el apagador de un foco, pero ya instalado super bien, fácil de usar y configurar y con alexa trabaja muy bien

Me encanto, funciona perfecto, la aplicación es fácil de configurar (Kasa), funciona a la perfección con Alexa, el único detalle es que la caja es grande y si tienes muchos cables es difícil de acomodar para instalar
Looks great and has an indicator on it so you can see the switch and status of lights not in the room with the switch.
So it keeps dropping the wifi and loosing connection. I’m not sure why but I’ve ran it through the suggested “fixes” and it still happens. When it does connect it is great.
Works great! Set up was easy as was installation. Links with alexa so seamlessly.
Great product and wonderful customer service. I now have 3 of these and will definitely buy more. I use it with Google Home Mini
Switched seemed like a good idea. The problem it failed to tell you that it ONLY works with wi-fi of 2.4 Hz. It works fine as a light switch, but not what I bought it for.

Overall I like the product. I bought one for all of my light switches. Sadly one of them does not click.. which I just noticed. It’s a shame because I’m past the return window. Good product besides the fact that some switches appear to be faulty.
Facil a installer si vous n'avez pas de neutre ce nest pas grave branche votre neutre sur le ground truc électricien
This product works flawlessly with both my Goole home and Alexa. Timer works. Everything works perfectly. Works with LED bulbs of all types. This is awesome!

Desgraciadamente no lo he podido instalar ya que en mi cuarto solo tengo fase y neutro, y no ha funcionado correctamente, pero se ve de buena calidad y si funciona con google assistant lo c por que si lo conecte a la corriente (intento de instalación) y al wifi tambien

Easy to install and solve my problem of programming a digital timer for my fan.Works with Kasa appbutbthe firmware upgrade is finicky.  I waited 5 minutes to be sure before closing the kasa app and reconnecting to the switch.  Works with my 2 TPlink smart plugs so everythingin 1 app.

Nice appearance, on and off and schedule works perfect with  from Kasa App. Installation instructions were easy to follow. Deal price was awesome, timely deliveryOnly draw back is probably size switch occupies complete outlet
Kasa is the gold standard for smart switches. They work with everything - google assistant, Alexa, Samsung Smartthings, nest,.. Everything. No hub, just wifi required. No complaints at all.
Easy to install, app is easy to use , I started with one and now I have six , great for when you forget or already in bed and don't want to get up after tucking your self in
I was having pot lights put in, so I had the electrician install the switch. One installed it was very easy to install with the kasa app. Works great with Google home.

Have two of these switches now, they work well, app is easy to understand and use. Customer service is excellent, and I mean they go above and beyond to help resolve issues you might have with product use and installation.
Damn. The thing is BIG. You have to have a lot of space be CAREFULL. I think it's too pricey for what it is in the end.
Product was easy to install - able to schedule lights on and off easily. I installed on outside lights to come on at sunset, and program to go off during night time routine. Makes any light “smart”.
Have a couple of these switches installed & programmed using TP-Link's app. The switches work very well. The app also works well. It would be nice to have the option to randomize on and off times.
Fast delivery and nice product. Took less than 15 minutes to install and setup on Kasa and Alexa. Works great...
Have installed a few smart switches, these were one of the easiest to setup and they work well for over 2 months now. Construction is good but looks a little like cheap plastic.

As a couple it was a paper, scissors, rock, situation to turn off the lights before going to bed.Not anymore! With this switch is just a matter of opening the app on your cell phone while you're in the bed.
Very Nice product. Easy to setup. I've had it for three days and the only thing is I have to tell my Google Home to turn off the switch in my room instead of turn off the lights.

Great switches work amazing with Google home and easy to install. Only flaw is that they are slightly bigger and wider than standard switches so it's better if they are just alone because they don't fit easily into double wall switches. But otherwise amazing product overall

I couldn't install the switch. Due to wiring in my old house the were extra wires. Read instructions carefully due to wireless functions it may not be compatible. Had to return. Did so with no problems
A bit of a pain to install with the size of the switch box itself but looks amazing and seems to work with out issue.
after install the switches set up and operated with a phone app and alexa all great
A nice switch for the price but the app isn't as user friendly as some other smart products and other items by the same manufacturer can be expensive.
Works well and picks up wifi signal easily. But needed to try several times with Alexa app before finally connecting.
Great product, easy to use with app and amazon alexa, however price has increase, $11 in 3 months, I purchased for $23, no $34+, why price increase.
They work flawlessly and haven’t had a single issue since install. Unlike the Meross brand which are a complete waste of time and money
Install wasn't too hard, instructions helped a lot. The app works great on android and widget helps a lot.
This product works great! Previously purchased the Teckin plugs which kept losing comms and had to be reprogrammed continually. These never lose comms!!
Easy to install and looks very modern. The increased hardware required did make fitting it back into the stock housing a bit of a challenge.
Impressed so far.  Used for front house lights and Christmas light switch to program turing off and on and with Alexa.
Easy to install, app for smart phone let’s you access the switch from anywhere.

I had a  Google Home Mini and wanted to control home exterior lighting. Replaced the standard light switch with this device and installed the Kasa and Google Assistant apps on my Android phone. Now I can turn the lights on/off from the Google mini or Google Assistant on my phone with voice commands.
It does the job well and easy to install in 15 minutes! I used for my front gate light with Scheduling.
Works great was easy to install, pairing is simple. Needs neutral wire.
Génial. Simple a utilisé et installer.Dommage que le prix est augmentée sinon j'en aurai acheter d'autres

Very good product, a little bit difficult to install for those who don’t have the same coloured wires as the instructions. All in all works very great. If lights start flashing on and off, this means that you have mixed up the two power wires.

Installed this in a garage to control lights outside the garage. It only gets wifi with the door open (steel building). That was enough to set up the schedule, which works perfectly even without continuous wifi signal.

I love this smart switch - it's easy to use, works perfectly, easy to program. The only thing that was a bit difficult was fitting the switch into the wall after wiring it, since the switch is quite thick. The wiring instructions were very straightforward though.
These are great and the app is very easy to use and responsive. I’m addicted to putting these one by one all over my house
Great product... Need the proper wiring in your house to be able to use this so make sure you do before purchase
Bought this for convenience, but the switch is ALWAYS undetectable for some reason. It never works when we want it to, it is so frustrating
We have a century home and it did not fit in most sockets. Something to consider if you have a old home.
Dans l'appartement où je suis, il n'y a pas la possibilité de connecté le 3eme fil vert (prise a la terre ou neutre), donc je ne peux l'utiliser. Frustrant.
Easy install, no problems with performance, works well with my google home, looks stylish and the app isn't horrible to use. Would add more of these when they go on sale.

It works flawlessly. As long as you are connected to the same wifi it doesnt matter if your internet down, it works. You can create routine, example- you can set certain lights to turn on and off when you leave or arrive home.

They just work. Any struggles I've had with them are mostly due to my wireless network struggling to reach the switches through the house which I resolved with an added access point. The box is a bit bulky so it's harder to fit multiples of these into 2 or 3 switch outlets, but you can make it work.
si bien instalarlo no es tan sencillo (no se nada de electricidad) al lograr ponerlo en función es muy bueno y sencillo de usar, estoy muy conforme con la compra
Si tienes muchos focos que se prenden con un mismo interruptor, es la manera mas facil de automatizarlo, funciona perfecto con Alexa que es clave y no requiere de Hub ya que va por wifi
I have bought a number of these light switches and they work perfect with my Echo. Will buy again when upgrading the rest of the switches
Had trouble connecting to the tp link app  way to long and to many tries, eventually  it worked !!!!Would buy again .
It has been working for few months since installed, but one of switches is now out of services. It seems quality of switches are poor!
